ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Geomagnetic Auroral Electrojet Index Provisional AE
ResourceHeader.Description: The geomagnetic auroral electrojet index at 1-min time resolution, derived at World Data Center for Geomagnetism, Kyoto, Kyoto University.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If the data are used in publications and presentations, the data suppliers and the WDC for Geomagnetism, Kyoto must properly be acknowledged.

InformationURL.Name: Geomagnetic Auroral Electrojet index Home Page
InformationURL.Description: The web site with links to pages describing the internationally accepted standard technique for generating the AE Index and for access to the index data in WDC format.

AccessURL.Name: Geomagnetic Data Service
AccessURL.Description: Geomagnetic Data Service at World Data Center for Geomagnetism, Kyoto.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: If the data are used in publications and presentations, the data suppliers and the WDC for Geomagnetism, Kyoto must properly be acknowledged.

TimeSpan.Note: Data for April 1989 to December 1989 are not available.

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Time is expressed with year, month, day, hour, and min, each stored in integer format. Details of the data record format is described at http://wdc.kugi.kyoto-u.ac.jp/aeasy/format/aeformat.html

Parameter.Name: Geomagnetic Auroral Electrojet index Provisional AE
Parameter.Description: The AE index is expressed in integer format. Details of the data record format is described at http://wdc.kugi.kyoto-u.ac.jp/aeasy/format/aeformat.html
